General.changeStart: It looks like it's time for a diaper change! Let's check just to be sure.
General.brandSelect: Yep, it definitely looks like you need a change, kiddo.\n What kind of diaper do you want to wear?
General.changeConfirm: *With the correct changing supplies on hand, Ralsei gives an inviting pat to the changing table* \n **"Alright, let's get you changed into a fresh diaper!"**
General.changeDeny: *Ralsei gives a disappointed look* \n **"Aww, are you sure?  You're pretty wet, you know..."**
General.change: *Ralsei lays you down on the changing table, undoing your diaper and wiping you clean with a baby wipe.  He then lifts your legs up and slides a fresh diaper under you, sprinkling on some baby powder before taping it up snugly.* \n **"All done!  You're all clean and dry now!"**
General.changeEnd: *Ralsei gives a gentle pat to your diapered rear, along with a biiiiiig hug* \n **"All done!  Run along now, kiddo!"**
General.title: __Diaper Change__

Wet.Dry: *Ralsei gently prods a digit in your leg guards, checking for wetness. He raises his eyebrows in surprise* \n **Oh! Wow, I guess you're still dry, huh?**
Wet.Damp: *Ralsei hooks a finger along the inside your leak guards, observing the front of your diaper for any faded indicators* \n**"Hmm, a little damp, but not too bad!"**
Wet.Wet: *Ralsei prods the front with a slight squish and pats the sagging front a little.* \n **"Heh, yep, you've wet this one!"**
Wet.Soaked: *Ralsei prods the front of your diaper and lightly squeezes the front, causing it to squish.* \n **"Oh wow, you're pretty soaked!  Your diaper's not going to hold out much longer!"**
Wet.Leaking: *Ralsei gives a worried look as he observes the front of your diaper, along with the droplets quickly falling to the floor.* **"U-um, yep!  You're leaking alright, time for a change!"**

Messy.title:
***
Ralsei sniffs the air and tugs on the back of your diaper to check for any other accidents***
Messy.clean: *Ralsei peers in to check you, sniffing to make sure*\n **"Looks like you're still clean back here, for now!"**
Messy.littleMessy: *Ralsei sniffs and pulls back on your diaper.* **"Oh dear, it looks like you might've had a little accident!  It's not _too_ bad, though!"**
Messy.kindaMessy: *Ralsei wrinkles his nose and lightly tugs on your diaper's rear waistband.* **"Uh oh, definitely looks like you had an accident!  Might be time for a change~"** *he says, patting your sagging seat.*
Messy.veryMessy: *Ralsei wrinkles his nose and fans his nose.* **"Phew!  I don't even need to look to tell you need a change! Let's get you cleaned up!"**
